faqs.q: How many calories in 1 cup of sugar?
faqs.a: Approximately 774 kcal for 1 cup granulated white sugar.
Yes, 100% carbs per 100 g, with 0 g protein, fat, or fiber.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in 1 cup?
faqs.a: About 200 g of granulated sugar, all simple sugars.

faqs.q: Calories in brown sugar vs. white?
faqs.a: Similar; brown is ~380 kcal per 100 g, slightly less than white's 387.

faqs.q: Does packing affect calories in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, packed cups weigh more (up to 220 g), increasing calories to ~850 kcal.
